frequency.$comment: Consult External Code List table EventFrequency6Code

documentNumber.description: Document number (alphanumeric characters only, no special characters)

residenceStatus.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalResidenceStatusCode

collateralClientCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table CollateralClientCategoryCode

collateralCoverageType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralCoverageTypeCode

assetNumber.description: A number that unambiguously identifies the collateral. Provides the deposit record number

holderIndicator.description: Identifies if the deposit was made by the collateral holder

coverageMarginIndicator.description: Identifies if the collateral covers the margin

collateralType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralTypeCode

financialInstrumentExchange.description: Identifier code of the exchange where the instrument is listed

deliveryQuantity.description: Distributed collateral quantity to another account

collateralValueAmount.description: Collateral accepted value amount after taking into account the haircut
